item.title: Amethyst Shortcuts - MacOS Tiling Window Management
item.author: Author
item.description: I was very satisfied about the productivity of i3wm under Linux. Amethyst is the replacement that I found under MacOS. I list the default shortcuts with some organizations for getting used to it.

item.title: Manjaro I3 Shortcut Cheatsheet
item.author: Author
item.description: Note This is a cheatsheet that came along with the installation of Manjaro i3wm. I ported the PDF version to this Markdown format. From the signature, the original author is oberon. It is tedious for me to open helper PDF every time and resize it to my preference. I hope this will help you navigating in the i3. Welcome to manjaro i3! The default mod-key is <Super> (Windows-key).
